(Simplified: 鹎)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 卑 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 卑 [ bēi ] humble, low, inferior; to despise
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①鳥類的一屬，羽毛大部爲黑褐色，腹白，腿短而細弱，食果實和昆蟲。

鵯字的基本解释

鵯
bēi
见“鹎”。

鵯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bēi］
［《廣韻》府移切，平支，幫。］
［《廣韻》譬吉切，入質，滂。］
“鹎1”的繁体字。
(1)见“鵯鵊”。
(2)见“鵯鴂”。
(3)见“鵯鶋”。
(4)雀形目鵯科各种鸟的通称。大多成群活动，叫声明亮动听，以野生小浆果及各种昆虫为食，为我国长江以南地区常见的留鸟。其品种有白头鵯、绿翅短脚鵯、红耳鵯、黄臀鵯、绿鹦嘴鵯等。

鵯字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵯； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第09
【廣韻】譬吉切【集韻】【韻會】僻吉切，?音匹。鵯鶋，鳥也。【爾雅·釋鳥】譽斯，鵯鶋。【註】鴉烏也。小而多羣，腹下白，江東亦呼爲鵯烏。又【廣韻】府移切【集韻】【韻會】賔彌切，?音卑。義同。【集韻】或作?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bēi］
["Guangyun" House shift cut, flat support, help. ]
["Guangyun" is like Ji cut, enters the quality, and is pitiful. ]
Traditional characters for "鹎1".
(1) See "Bulbul".
(2) See "Bulbul".
(3) See "Bulbul".
(4) A general term for various birds of the Bulbulidae family of passerines. Most of them live in groups with bright and beautiful calls. They feed on small wild berries and various insects. They are common resident birds in the south of the Yangtze River in my country. Its species include white-headed bulbul, green-winged short-legged bulbul, red-eared bulbul, yellow-rumped bulbul, green parrot-billed bulbul and so on.
